attributes.action: Remove Mike Ashley & Dennis Wise from the Board of Newcastle United
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, request the Government of the United Kingdom incept and remove Mr Mike Ashley (The Fat Pie Eating One) and Mr Dennis Wise (The Wobbley Eyed Nookie Bear One)from Newcastle United.  Both of these men should be sent to live in France.

In their place, Mr Kevin Keegan (The Messiah) should be placed in the position of Club Owner.

Come on - You bailed out Northern Rock, so you can bail us out...

All who agree with the above, please sign below:

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
